key.mimi.midi.settings: Open MIDI Input Device Configuration GUI
key.mimi.midi.alloff: Stop all currently playing MIDI notes
key.mimi.midi.playlist: Open Playlist GUI when Transmitter on Hotbar
key.mimi.midi.gui.main: Open Instrument GUI for instrument in Main Hand
key.mimi.midi.gui.off: Open Instrument GUI for instrument in Off Hand
key.mimi.midi.gui.seat: Open Instrument GUI for instrument seated at
